issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

fields.description:
Upgrade Netty

this is a clone of HADOOP-13866, created to kick off yetus on HDFS, that being where netty is used

This message was automatically generated.

It doesn't seem to have run any tests:

https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HDFS-Build/17774/artifact/patchprocess/patch-unit-hadoop-project.txt

I think yetus looks for a file changed within a module to run that module's unit tests. It doesn't matter what JIRA project it's in.
ah, that v2 patch of ted did touch an hdfs file. Submitting
